description:
In this one-semester module, students will be placed in a
company abroad working on selected topics which are
important to engineering and technology management. The
students will be jointly supervised by a team comprising
NUS academic staff, the company’s appointed manager,
and an academic staff from the overseas partner
university.
Assessments will be done periodically (every 2 months),
leading to a project report and presentation at the end of
the attachment.
title: Overseas Industrial Project and Attachment
